name: St. Andrews Guest House

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: St. Andrews is a charming and lovely place to spend the night in Fort Williams. The owner is a lovely woman, she very kindly woke up very early in the morning simply because we asked if she would like us to check out the night prior because our bus was leaving so early the next day, and made us breakfast!
reviews.title: Lovely guest house!

reviews.text: The family is wonderful, the guest house is quite nice, beautifully upkept, in a gorgeous old choir house. Very convenient to downtown Fort Williams, the main shopping street, the bus station, the train station ... it's all right there, but removed by a street so very quiet and peaceful.
reviews.title: Charming and excellent value.

likes.liked: — Location. Charm. Good value single occupancy.

aka: St. Andrews Guest House Fort William, Scotland
